comment: She's really helpful and nice especially if you're not sure what you're doing. She scores very generously. Lots of assignments like quizzes and the lab worksheets but they're not difficult. The biggest grades are 2 posters, 1 that you present, and she gives good feedback. I highly recommend taking her. Also, make sure to get a good lab partner.
She is so nice and really cares about everyones grades. I had her for lab and she grades so easy and lets you make up anything except quizzes.
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things
